rules.prepare:
export CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -O2 -g -Wall -D_REENTRANT"
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update autoreconf -v -fi
sed -i 's@$(INSTALL) -T@$(INSTALL)@g' Makefile.in
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --enable-libgdbm-compat \ finish_cmds=""
echo "/* We use fcntl locking (POSIX) instead of flock (BSD) */" >> autoconf.h echo "#undef HAVE_FLOCK" >> autoconf.h
rules.build:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make
# no clue why this comes out wrong chmod 644 gdbm.h
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make BINOWN="`whoami`" BINGRP="`whoami`" \ prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ infodir="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/info" \ man3dir="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/man/man3" \ install install-compat
mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/ndbm.h" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/gdbm-ndbm.h"
